title: Crash when logging in after switching networks
body:
### Description
*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: Status app has crashed when trying to log-in after switching network from Mainnet with RPC to Ropsten. I cannot replicate it but would be good to investigate the [crash logs](https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803590-status/builds/8168269/sessions/6/?accessToken=JlDa2Qj0p/6RszG9xabGD2elPSs) anyway.

#### Expected behavior
The app is supposed to crash after switching networks but should not crash later on when logging in.

#### Actual behavior
The app crashed during log-in.

### Reproduction
- Open Status
- Log in
- Change network to Mainnet with RCP
- Log in again
- Change network to Ropsten
- Try to log in again

### Additional Information
* Status version: nightly, April 24
* Operating System: iOS 11.2.6
* Device: iPhone 8
* I could not replicate it. Tried 3 times
* [Crash logs](https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803590-status/builds/8168269/sessions/6/?accessToken=JlDa2Qj0p/6RszG9xabGD2elPSs
) to investigate

Another crash happened when I recovered an account, logged in, switched from Mainnet to Ropsten and then tried to log in again. I was on Android. I also could not reproduce it.

Logcat: 


https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/3981

Reproduced on release [build 10](https://jenkins.status.im/job/status-react/job/public-beta-1-testfairy/10/) TF session(from 24:22): https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803590-status/builds/8503790/sessions/4394603372/?accessToken=9bP0E7-P34sNNiY-etWBt7L6yCw
TestFairy: Status 0.9.21 (6106) @2018
